授業目的: The purpose of this course is for students to gain communication strategies that can be used in both social and academic situations in and out of Japan. Students will also learn how to make a presentation
到達目標: The students will acquire discussion, debate, and critical thinking skills, and they will also learn how to make effective presentations in English.
授業方法: Online until given permission to have in-person classes on-campus.

第2回: Textbook: unit 1: Making introductions; requirements for final presentation; TED speech and questions
Review expressions; discussion strategies, and prepare for practice speech.
第3回: Present practice speech; textbook: unit 2: Describing people
Create a basic outline for the final presentation, review U.2 discussion strategies
第4回: Textbook: unit 3: Talking about habits; useful expressions and terms for agreeing and disagreeing
Review expressions; discussion strategies; do research on presentation topic
第6回: Textbook: unit 4: Describing places; review for quiz
Complete unit section in textbook; study for next week’s quiz
第7回: Review expressions; discussion strategies; work on presentation script and slides, following rubric
第8回: Review expressions; discussion strategies; make suggested revisions for presentation
第9回: Class debate; textbook: unit 10: Likes and dislikes
Complete page: 65; review the vocabulary and discussion strategies
第10回: Practice your presentation, following the rubric.
第11回: Reflect on your presentation or classmates’ presentation and determine what improvements could be made by using the rubric; review expressions
第12回: Reflect on your presentation or classmates’ presentation and determine what improvements could be made by using the rubric; review expressions
第13回: Unit 12: Change; review for final examination

教科書/Required texts1: Carlson, J., Jordan, N., Craven, M., et al.
